div.div: Knox College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Knox wins the toss and defers. Lake Forest will defend east end zone.
W. Koerber kickoff 65 yards to the LFC00, touchback.
Lake Forest College drive start at 15:00.
Charlie Quinn rush for no gain to the LFC25 (C. Hipp).
Sean Dickson pass complete to Max Sorby for 11 yards to the LFC36 (L. Hollis).
